name: Vintage Leather Jacket
description: A timeless classic, this vintage leather jacket is made from high-quality leather and features a stylish design that never goes out of fashion.

name: Smart Watch Series 5
description: Stay connected and track your fitness goals with the Smart Watch Series 5. Features include heart rate monitoring, GPS, and seamless connectivity with your smartphone.

name: Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Experience unparalleled sound quality and block out unwanted noise with these premium noise-cancelling headphones. Perfect for travel, work, or relaxation.

name: Gaming Laptop
description: Power through your favorite games with this high-performance gaming laptop. Equipped with the latest graphics card and a fast processor for smooth gameplay.

name: 4K Ultra HD TV
description: Upgrade your home entertainment system with this 4K Ultra HD TV. Enjoy stunning picture quality and vibrant colors in every scene.

name: Espresso Machine
description: Brew barista-quality espresso at home with this easy-to-use espresso machine. Features multiple settings for different coffee styles and a sleek, modern design.
